title: startupjobs2jazzHR actor input schema
description: Please fill in the StartupJobs and JazzHR token. The tokens are needed for the actor to work properly.

startupJobsToken.title: StartupJobs token
startupJobsToken.description: Your StartupJobs token. You have to contact the StartupJobs support to generate it for you.

jazzHRToken.title: JazzHR token
jazzHRToken.description: Your JazzHR token. Here is how to find your token.
